title: Ralph Lauren, Walmart Suppliers Among Winners in India-US Deal
description: Footwear manufacturers and apparel exporters emerged as major winners in the joint framework for an interim trade deal between the US and India, a development that will alleviate uncertainty for financial markets.
content: Footwear manufacturers and apparel exporters emerged as major winners in the joint framework for an interim trade deal between the US and India, a development that will alleviate uncertainty for financial markets.
